summary: The Protect Older Job Applicants Act of 2025 (POJA Act of 2025) amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to prohibit employers from limiting, segregating, or classifying job applicants based on age. It mandates the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) to conduct a study within a year of the Act's enactment, analyzing age discrimination claims filed since 2015, and to provide recommendations for preventing such discrimination in hiring.
